author: Special Correspondent
text:
A voter awareness programme was organised for families of policemen at the Armed Reserve Ground here on Friday.

Addressing the gathering, Aravindan, Superintendent of Police, said that families of policemen could check whether their names found a place in the voters’ list through smart phones. He also launched a signature campaign and administered an oath to the family members to ensure cent per cent polling, according to an official press release. Those who addressed the gathering included C. Muthukumaran, District Revenue Officer, and Ravi, Additional Superintendent of Police.
title: Awareness programme
